
## Function to Run 
```{r}
render_one <- function(year) {
  # assuming the output format of input.Rmd is PDF
  rmarkdown::render(
    'input.Rmd',
    output_file = paste0(year, '.html'),
    params = list(year = year),
    envir = parent.frame()
  )
}
```

## Render ALL Reports

```{r}
for (year in 2019:2022) {
    render_one(year)
}
```
